text: aur jab sachche eemaanadaaron ne (kuphphaar ke) jamaghaton ko dekha to (betakalluf) kahane lage ki ye vahee cheez to hai jisaka ham se khuda ne aur usake rasool ne vaayada kiya tha (isakee paravaah kya hai) aur khuda ne aur usake rasool ne bilkul theek kaha tha aur (isake dekhane se) unaka eemaanadaar aur unakee itaat aur bhee zinda ho gayee
